description: Manage and configure Azure Firewall Threat Intelligence Allow List.

commands.name: az network firewall threat-intel-allowlist create
commands.summary: Create an Azure Firewall Threat Intelligence Allow List.
commands.syntax:
az network firewall threat-intel-allowlist create --name
                                                  --resource-group
                                                  [--add]
                                                  [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                  [--fqdns]
                                                  [--ip-addresses]
                                                  [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                  [--remove]
                                                  [--set]
examples: az network firewall threat-intel-allowlist create -g MyResourceGroup -n MyFirewall --ip-addresses 10.0.0.0 10.0.0.1 --fqdns *.microsoft.com www.bing.com *google.com

commands.name: az network firewall threat-intel-allowlist delete
commands.summary: Delete an Azure Firewall Threat Intelligence Allow List.
commands.syntax:
az network firewall threat-intel-allowlist delete --name
                                                  --resource-group
                                                  [--add]
                                                  [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                  [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                  [--remove]
                                                  [--set]

commands.name: az network firewall threat-intel-allowlist show
commands.summary: Get the details of an Azure Firewall Threat Intelligence Allow List.

commands.name: az network firewall threat-intel-allowlist update
commands.summary: Update Azure Firewall Threat Intelligence Allow List.
commands.syntax:
az network firewall threat-intel-allowlist update --name
                                                  --resource-group
                                                  [--add]
                                                  [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                  [--fqdns]
                                                  [--ip-addresses]
                                                  [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                  [--remove]
                                                  [--set]
examples: az network firewall threat-intel-allowlist update -g MyResourceGroup -n MyFirewall --ip-addresses
